result.execSummary:
Kerry Shawn Steinmetz was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Kerry Shawn Steinmetz was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kerry Shawn Steinmetz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: signed by SRN and Def this date. eif

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Matthew L Hartung,  DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton,  DF:  Kerry Shawn Steinmetz appeared from jail. Court confirms address. Defendant has a felony warrant from Ramsey Co. MN.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Court gives options for Defendant and questions him.  Defendant wishes to waive extradition.  SRN swears Defendant in, both parties sign. Defendant be held without bail until MN has picked him up.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
